Ragnaros.name: Empower Sulfuras
Ragnaros.description: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 (+4% per level) Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.  Molten Core: Molten Swing Stun and damage nearby enemies.

Ragnaros.name: Living Meteor
Ragnaros.description: Vector Targeting Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 68 (+4% per level) damage, then rolls in the target direction dealing 272 (+4% per level) damage per second for 1.75 seconds.  Molten Core: Meteor Shower Drop a line of meteor impacts.

Ragnaros.name: Blast Wave
Ragnaros.description: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Molten Core: Explosive Rune Cause a delayed explosion in a large area.

Ragnaros.name: Sulfuras Smash
Ragnaros.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

Ragnaros.name: Lava Wave
Ragnaros.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

Ragnaros.name: Molten Core
Ragnaros.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 (+4% per level) Health that burns away over 18 seconds.  Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.

RagnarosBigRag.name: Sulfuras Smash
RagnarosBigRag.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

RagnarosBigRag.name: Explosive Rune
RagnarosBigRag.description: Create a rune that deals 285 (+4% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies after 1.5 seconds.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

RagnarosBigRag.name: Molten Swing
RagnarosBigRag.description: Swing Sulfuras in a wide arc, dealing 161 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning enemies for 1 second.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

RagnarosBigRag.name: Meteor Shower
RagnarosBigRag.description: Vector Targeting Summon 3 meteors at the target point that fall in the target direction. Each meteor deals 151 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.  Damage increased by 25% versus Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

1.name: Sulfuras Hungers
1.description: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 25.  Reward: After killing 25 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 100.

1.name: Shifting Meteor
1.description: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 6% increased damage from it.  Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

1.name: Engulfing Flame
1.description: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

4.name: Fire Ward
4.description: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Armor, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Slow Burn
4.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

4.name: Catching Fire
4.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75.  Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

7.name: Hand of Ragnaros
7.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, refund 10 Mana and its cooldown recharges 100% faster for 4 seconds.

7.name: Molten Power
7.description: If Living Meteor hits enemy Heroes at least 5 times, reduce its cooldown by 7 seconds, and refund 30 Mana.

7.name: Blistering Attacks
7.description: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

10.name: Sulfuras Smash
10.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

10.name: Lava Wave
10.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

13.name: Cauterize Wounds
13.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 45% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

13.name: Tempered Flame
13.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

13.name: Resilient Flame
13.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

16.name: Giant Scorcher
16.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

16.name: Meteor Bomb
16.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies at its center take 30% increased damage.

16.name: Blast Echo
16.description: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

20.name: Flames of Sulfuron
20.description: Sulfuras Smash Slows enemies by 50% for 2.5 seconds, and the Stun duration of enemies hit in the center is increased by 1 second.

20.name: Lava Surge
20.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Heroic Difficulty
20.description: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

20.name: Submerge
20.description: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.
